trans-unit.target: 「一旦我让风吹起，你会看到手下兵士如烟散去。」 ～西风法师阿蕾克丝

trans-unit.source: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

trans-unit.target: 「我从不考虑对手有何期望。 期望随着浪潮涨落。 他们只会更快撤退。」 ～大使拉夸塔

trans-unit.source: "An army has filled the valley, but it's not like any army I've ever seen. There are no tents, no fires, no horses . . . just a sea of bodies, writhing and moaning, as if a pestilent village were sent to invade us."\n—Onean scout
trans-unit.target: 「山谷满满都是部队，但我没见过这种的。 里面没有帐棚，没有马匹...只有一望无际的人海，个个扭动呻吟着，好象整个瘟疫村庄都给派来侵略我们一样。」 ～欧尼亚斥候

trans-unit.target: {T}：死斗战士卡马尔对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.
trans-unit.target: 在自由近乎失落之时，强壮心灵将挺身夺回。

trans-unit.source: Lava Axe
trans-unit.target: 熔岩斧

trans-unit.source: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
trans-unit.target: 熔岩斧对目标牌手造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Catch!"
trans-unit.target: 「接招！」

trans-unit.source: Lavaborn Muse
trans-unit.target: 熔生谬思

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to him or her.
trans-unit.target: 在每位对手的维持开始时，若该牌手的手牌为两张或更少，则熔生谬思对他造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Her voice is disaster, painful and final."\n—Matoc, lavamancer
trans-unit.target: 「她的声音蕴含灾祸，痛苦而绝望。」 ～熔岩术士马佗克

trans-unit.source: Lightning Elemental
trans-unit.target: 闪电元素

trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷（此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）

trans-unit.source: "A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave,\nHe passes from life to his rest in the grave."\n—William Knox, "Mortality"
trans-unit.target: 「闪耀的光芒，波动的裂隙， 他穿过生命直达墓场而安息。」 ～威廉·诺克斯，「凡命」

trans-unit.target: 法术力倒钩

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手横置一个地以产生法术力时，法术力倒钩对该牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "I don't know why people say a double-edged sword is bad. It's a sword. With two edges."\n—Kamahl, pit fighter
trans-unit.target: 「我不知道为何人们总说双面刃不好。 这就是把剑。上面有两道刃。」 ～死斗战士卡马尔

trans-unit.source: Mogg Fanatic
trans-unit.target: 迷乱莫葛

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲迷乱莫葛：迷乱莫葛对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "I got it! I got it! I—"
trans-unit.target: 「我抓到了！ 我抓到了！ 我～」

trans-unit.source: Orcish Artillery
trans-unit.target: 半兽人的大炮

trans-unit.source: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: {T}：半兽人的大炮对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害，并且对你造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "So they want to kill my men? Well two can play at that game."\n—General Khurzog
trans-unit.target: 「想宰我的部下？ 找两个人陪他们玩玩。」 ～喀左格将军

trans-unit.source: Prodigal Pyromancer

trans-unit.source: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."
trans-unit.target: 「我在看什么？ 灰烬，死人。」

trans-unit.source: Pyroclasm
trans-unit.target: 烈火断层

trans-unit.target: 烈火断层对每个生物各造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "When the air burns, only death breathes deep."\n—Bogardan mage
trans-unit.target: 「空气燃烧时，只有死亡才能深呼吸。」 ～博卡登法术师

trans-unit.source: Relentless Assault
trans-unit.target: 无情的突袭

trans-unit.source: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
trans-unit.target: 重置所有于本回合中曾经攻击的生物。 在此行动阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段，以及接于其后之一个额外的行动阶段。

trans-unit.source: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."
trans-unit.target: 「手下留情？ 运动场上才可能手下留情，战场上没这回事。」

trans-unit.source: Rock Badger
trans-unit.target: 岩獾

trans-unit.target: 山脉行者（只要防御牌手操控山脉，此生物便不能被阻挡）

trans-unit.target: 「他冲向要塞时，我还当成是头熊。 到了他撞破壁垒与半数卫兵后，我真巴不得他是头熊。」 ～巨弩守卫

trans-unit.source: Scoria Wurm
trans-unit.target: 矿渣亚龙

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, return Scoria Wurm to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，掷一枚硬币。 如果你输掉此掷，将矿渣亚龙移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Late at night, ululations echo from deep under Shiv, as the wurms sing of times older than humanity.
trans-unit.target: 深夜时分，西瓦的深处便传出阵阵嚎声，像是亚龙们在歌唱着人类出现以前的远古岁月。

trans-unit.source: Seismic Assault
trans-unit.target: 地动来袭

trans-unit.target: 弃掉一张地牌：地动来袭对目标生物或玩家造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Earth arms itself with fire.
trans-unit.target: 大地以火焰武装自己。

trans-unit.target: 粉碎风暴

trans-unit.source: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有神器。 它们不能重生。

trans-unit.source: From a marvel of magical mechanization to a smoking stack of scrap in one easy step.
trans-unit.target: 从法术器械的奇迹变成一堆冒烟废铁，过程简单至极。

trans-unit.target: 易辙

trans-unit.source: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
trans-unit.target: 为仅指定单一目标的目标咒语更改目标。

trans-unit.source: Aranghil held her fury in her heart, hard and bright as a ruby. With its razor edge, she rewrote the laws of battle.
trans-unit.target: 阿朗喜将怒火藏在心中，坚硬明亮如红宝石。 她用此锐利锋芒改写战争法则。

trans-unit.source: Siege-Gang Commander
trans-unit.target: 攻城指挥官

trans-unit.source: When Siege-Gang Commander comes into play, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 当攻城指挥官进场时，将三个1/1红色精灵衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡的法律是用来保护工业，而不是保护市民。 老旧的武具均应销毁而不予修复，如此才能充实工厂的金库。

trans-unit.source: Soulblast
trans-unit.target: 灵魂冲击

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play Soulblast, sacrifice all creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲所有由你操控的生物，以作为使用灵魂冲击的额外费用。

trans-unit.source: Soulblast deals damage to target creature or player equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.
trans-unit.target: 灵魂冲击对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的力量总和。

trans-unit.source: Vulshok shamans could never keep them alive for more than a few seconds, yet those few seconds seemed to be enough.
trans-unit.target: 瓦许克祭师只有本领让他们活上几秒钟，但这几秒便已足够。

trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以将精灵总督斯奎从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Some goblins are expendable. Some are impossible to get rid of. But he's both—at the same time!"\n—Starke
trans-unit.target: 「有些精灵是消耗品。 有些则根本摆脱不掉。 但他两者都是～摆脱不掉的消耗品！」 ～史塔克

trans-unit.target: 「有人认为先考虑再行动才稳当。 我拿下的人头通常都还在考虑各种应对之道。」 ～熔岩法师赭拉瓦

trans-unit.source: Warp World
trans-unit.target: 歪曲世相

trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way into play, then puts all enchantment cards revealed this way into play, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put into play on the bottom of his or her library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手把由他拥有的所有永久物洗入其牌库，然后从其牌库顶展示等量的牌。 每位牌手把以此法展示的所有神器，生物，与地牌放置进场，然后把以此法展示的所有结界牌放置进场，然后将所有以此法展示且未放置进场的牌以任意顺序置于其牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Abundance

trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 若你将抓一张牌，则你可以改为选择地牌或非地牌，并从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到你展示出一张该种类的牌为止。 将该牌置于你手上，然后将以此法展示的其它牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}，牺牲一个生物：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew."\n—Kaervek
trans-unit.target: 「非瑞克西亚之秘密的代价非常昂贵。 你必须以铜与骨，钢与腱来做代偿。」 ～凯雷威克

trans-unit.source: Pithing Needle
trans-unit.target: 穿髓金针

trans-unit.source: As Pithing Needle comes into play, name a card.
trans-unit.target: 于穿髓金针进场时，说出一个牌名。

trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be played unless they're mana abilities.
trans-unit.target: 除了法术力异能之外，具有该名称之来源的起动式异能都不能使用。

trans-unit.source: Platinum Angel
trans-unit.target: 白金天使

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）

trans-unit.source: You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
trans-unit.target: 你这盘游戏不会输，对手也不会赢。

trans-unit.source: In its heart lies the secret of immortality.
trans-unit.target: 心中埋藏着不朽的秘密。

trans-unit.source: First strike

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，除非你弃一张牌，否则牺牲锐鬃异狮。

trans-unit.target: 在你的抓牌步骤开始时，你可以让锐鬃异狮对目标生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Rod of Ruin
trans-unit.target: 遗迹棍棒

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：遗迹棍棒对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.
trans-unit.target: 这支棍棒是远古年代的遗物...那是个残忍、恶毒、心灵败坏的年代。

trans-unit.source: Sculpting Steel
trans-unit.target: 塑型钢

trans-unit.source: As Sculpting Steel comes into play, you may choose an artifact in play. If you do, Sculpting Steel comes into play as a copy of that artifact.
trans-unit.target: 于塑型钢进场时，你可以选择场上的一个神器。 若你如此作，则塑型钢进场时为该神器的复制。

trans-unit.source: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.
trans-unit.target: 某位神器师不慎把它掉落在摆满钱币的地窖中。 她到现在还没能把它找出来。

trans-unit.source: Spellbook
trans-unit.target: 法术书

trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.source: "Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「这个聪慧女子将所学的每样东西都写进书里；最后每一页都被墨水涂黑了，她又改用白墨水，重新开始。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.source: Steel Golem
trans-unit.target: 钢铁魔像

trans-unit.source: You can't play creature spells.
trans-unit.target: 你不能使用生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Once you create perfection, what else is there to make?"\n—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist
trans-unit.target: 「造出完美之后，你还能作些什么？」 ～索地威工匠阿肯·达格森

trans-unit.source: Such cloaks are in high demand both by assassins and by those who fear them.
trans-unit.target: 这斗篷很受杀手与担忧成其目标者欢迎。
